main_definition: Techno is an adjective referring to technology, especially the electronic dance music genre that has its roots in Detroit, Michigan.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Related to technology or technological processes and devices
meanings_and_examples.example: The techno industry is constantly evolving with new innovations.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Referring to the electronic dance music genre
meanings_and_examples.example: She loves listening to deep house and trance, two sub-genres of techno.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used to describe a futuristic or high-tech feel in various contexts such as clothing, accessories, etc.
meanings_and_examples.example: He wore his techno sunglasses with confidence at the party.
